Remarks. The type locality of
B. politicollis
is confirmed to be Nyinmo Township, Banbar County, Xizang , China from a paper of expedition journey published by Kaulback (1938) . After the examination of type specimens of
B. politicollis
and
B. baqenensis
, as well as additional specimens,
B. baqenensis
become a junior synonym of
B. politicollis
.
